ISSUE.TITLE: 4.50 Scheduled Tasks errors
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: Getting multiple scheduled task errors (emails, keepalive, delete guests etc) eg. "The "Send emails" scheduled task failed with the "Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. (Parameter 'value')" error (Task type: "Nop.Services.Messages.QueuedMessagesSendTask, Nop.Services". Store name: "nop4.50". Task run address: "http://nop45.socksandboots.com/scheduletask/runtask")." "The "Keep alive" scheduled task failed with the "Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. (Parameter 'value')" error (Task type: "Nop.Services.Common.KeepAliveTask, Nop.Services". Store name: "nop4.50". Task run address: "http://nop45.socksandboots.com/scheduletask/runtask")." I've set plenty of nopC sites up over the years, and not had this before. Don't get this on a default install of 4.40
